name: test_e2e_with_logs[414_CRLF_CACHE_002]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CRLF_CACHE_002` |
| **Name** | Cache Poisoning via X-Original-URL CRLF |
| **Category** | CRLF |
| **Subcategory** | cache_poisoning |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `\r\nX-Original-URL:/admin`
- **Encoded**: `%0d%0aX-Original-URL%3A%2Fadmin`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~2000ms
- **Timestamp**: 13:36:51.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

|------|-------|

| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX CRLF] CRLF Injection attempt detected test_id=CRLF_CACHE_002-1771076211349-2lyw4a pattern_id=CRLF_CACHE_002 uri=/?q=%0d%0aX-Original-URL%3A%2Fadmin client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence
